title: a unit of 3 rooms, best option for 3 friends, walk to T
posting_body: 4 minute walk from Green Line "B" "Washington st" station
We have a unit of 3 rooms, a good setting where 3 friends live together.
rent includes all utils except electricity.
BOSTON UNIVERSITY BOSTON COLLEGE BERKLEE LONGWOOD JOSLIN, BWH, BIDMC, DANA FARBER MCPHS
Great location especially for Boston University and Boston College,
Lots of BU and BC students living in neighbor.
Great location for Berklee College of Music.

Great location for Harvard Medical School Hospitals in longwood (1 minute walk to bus 65 station and brings you to Longwood in 15 minutes (Dana Farber, Children's Hospital, BWH Brigham Women's, BI BIDMC Beth Israel, Joselin, Massachusetts College of Pharmacy and Health Sciences MCPHS)
